about_the_game:
The Omni Edition is a Season Pass that allows you to both support the development of our game, AND pre-order access to future DLC content.

Affray Interactive is an independent development team and, as such, we face certain hurdles in creating our first and flagship title. SCP: 5K has proven that it has legs but in order to become a truly great game and addition to the tactical-horror games out there, we need your help.

In the Omni Edition, you are getting:

  • 3 DLC Campaign missions (To be developed and released after the base game is completed)
  • Exclusive Omni Edition cosmetics for your character and weapons.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains blood, gore, and bodily dismemberment. 

This game also depicts strong story themes, such as terrorism, that is advised for mature audiences only. Individuals that have experienced traumatic events are advised not to play SCP: Pandemic.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: 4 physical cores
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2048MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 or Windows 11

  • Graphics: 4096MB of VRAM
